description: Creates a new schedule for one or more DataBrew jobs. Jobs can be run at a specific date and time, or at regular intervals.

parameters.name: JobNames
parameters.description: The name or names of one or more jobs to be run. (string) ---

parameters.name: CronExpression
parameters.description: The date or dates and time or times when the jobs are to be run. For more information, see Cron expressions in the Glue DataBrew Developer Guide.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Metadata tags to apply to this schedule. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: A unique name for the schedule. Valid characters are alphanumeric (A-Z, a-z, 0-9), hyphen (-), period (.), and space.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the schedule that was created.
